meanings.meaning_en_US: To unload a cargo or dispose of something from one place.

examples.sentence: They decided to [dump] the old furniture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定丟掉舊家具

examples.sentence: He [dumped] the trash in the bin.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把垃圾扔進垃圾箱

examples.sentence: The truck will [dump] its load here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 卡車將在此卸下貨物

meanings.meaning_en_US: A striking structure in a pool or lake from which water is forced upward into the air.

examples.sentence: The park features a beautiful [fountain].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公園裡有一個美麗的噴泉。

examples.sentence: Children love to play near the [fountain].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們喜歡在噴泉旁玩耍。

examples.sentence: The [fountain] was illuminated at night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 噴泉在晚上被照亮。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A thin cylinder of finely cut tobacco rolled in paper for smoking.

examples.sentence: He lit a [cigarette] after dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在晚餐後抽煙

examples.sentence: Smoking a [cigarette] can harm your health.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 抽香煙可能會損害你的健康

examples.sentence: She handed him a [cigarette] from her pack.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她從包裡給了他一根香煙

meanings.meaning_en_US: A room or area for waiting, often leading to other rooms.

examples.sentence: We waited in the [lobby] for our appointment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在大廳裡等候約會。

examples.sentence: The hotel [lobby] was beautifully decorated.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 飯店的大廳裝飾得很漂亮。

examples.sentence: There was a coffee shop in the [lobby] of the building.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 大樓的前廳裡有一家咖啡店。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The title of a newspaper article, often in large type.

examples.sentence: The [headline] caught everyone's attention.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 標題引起了每個人的注意。

examples.sentence: She wrote a compelling [headline] for the article.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為這篇文章寫了一個引人注目的標題。

examples.sentence: The [headline] was printed in bold letters.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 標題以粗體字印刷。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To strike with the fist; to thrust or push.

examples.sentence: He decided to [punch] the bag to relieve stress.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定用拳打沙包來減壓

examples.sentence: She [punched] the clock to record her hours.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她打卡記錄工時

examples.sentence: The boxer trained hard to improve his [punch].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 拳擊手努力訓練提高他的拳擊

meanings.meaning_en_US: The short, fine hair that covers the bodies of many mammals.

examples.sentence: The cat has soft [fur].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 貓咪的毛很柔軟

examples.sentence: She wore a coat made of real [fur].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿著一件由真毛製成的外套

examples.sentence: Some animals shed their [fur] in spring.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一些動物在春天會脫毛

meanings.meaning_en_US: A barrier or enclosure made of posts and wire or wood.

examples.sentence: The dog jumped over the [fence].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那隻狗跳過了圍欄

examples.sentence: They built a [fence] to keep the kids safe.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們蓋了一個圍欄以保護孩子們的安全

examples.sentence: The garden was bordered by a white picket [fence].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 花園被一個白色的木籬笆圍住

meanings.meaning_en_US: Meeting the requirements or expectations; adequate.

examples.sentence: The results were [satisfactory], meeting all the criteria.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 結果令人滿意，符合所有標準。

examples.sentence: She received a [satisfactory] response to her proposal.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的提案得到了滿意的回應。

examples.sentence: The service at the restaurant was [satisfactory] but not exceptional.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 餐廳的服務令人滿意，但不算特別。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who physically fights for sport, self-defense, or competition.

examples.sentence: The [fighter] won the championship match.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位戰士贏得了冠軍賽

examples.sentence: She trains hard to become a professional [fighter].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她努力訓練以成為專業的戰士

examples.sentence: Boxing matches can be intense for any [fighter].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 拳擊比賽對任何戰士而言都可能是激烈的

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having significance or purpose.

examples.sentence: She attended the seminar for meaningful [insights] into the industry.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她參加研討會以獲得對行業的有意義見解。

examples.sentence: The project aims to create a [meaningful] impact on the community.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該項目旨在對社區產生有意義的影響。

examples.sentence: Having [meaningful] conversations can deepen relationships.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 進行有意義的對話能加深關係。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The soft substance consisting of muscle and fat that is found between the skin and bones.

examples.sentence: The surgeon carefully examined the [flesh] around the wound.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 外科醫生仔細檢查傷口周圍的肉體。

examples.sentence: The [flesh] of fruits like peaches is sweet and juicy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 桃子的肉體是甜的和多汁的。

examples.sentence: In certain cultures, the consumption of human [flesh] is taboo.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在某些文化中，食用人肉是禁忌的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: By a small margin; only just.

examples.sentence: She [barely] passed the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她勉強通過了考試。

examples.sentence: I can [barely] hear you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我勉強能聽見你。

examples.sentence: They [barely] made it to the train on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們勉強按時趕上了火車。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or to whatever place.

examples.sentence: You can go [wherever] you like.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以去你喜歡的任何地方

examples.sentence: I will find you [wherever] you are.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 無論你在哪裡，我都會找到你

examples.sentence: She travels [wherever] the job takes her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她隨著工作去任何地方旅行

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of thick heavy fabric that covers a section of a floor.

examples.sentence: The [rug] in the living room adds warmth.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 客廳的地毯增添了溫暖

examples.sentence: She tripped over the edge of the [rug].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她被地毯的邊緣絆倒了

examples.sentence: I need to vacuum the [rug] this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我這個週末需要吸塵地毯

meanings.meaning_en_US: A type of hard, crystalline metamorphic rock.

examples.sentence: The statue is made of marble.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座雕像是用大理石製成的。

examples.sentence: Marble is often used in flooring and countertops.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 大理石常用於地板和檯面。

examples.sentence: She admired the marble carvings in the museum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她欣賞博物館裡的大理石雕刻。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An instrument for converting sound waves into electrical energy.

examples.sentence: She spoke into the [microphone] during the presentation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在報告中對著麥克風講話

examples.sentence: The singer held the [microphone] close to her mouth.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 歌手把麥克風靠近她的嘴

examples.sentence: Adjust the [microphone] for better audio quality.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 調整麥克風以獲得更好的音質

meanings.meaning_en_US: The rise and fall of sea levels caused by the gravitational forces.

examples.sentence: The beach is beautiful at high [tide].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在高潮時，海灘很美。

examples.sentence: You can see the [tide] coming in at sunset.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在日落時看到潮水上升。

examples.sentence: The fisherman knows the best time to fish based on the [tide].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 漁夫根據潮汐知道最佳的釣魚時間。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An object that produces a magnetic field.

examples.sentence: The [magnet] attracted all the metal objects.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個磁鐵吸引了所有金屬物體。

examples.sentence: He used a [magnet] to pick up the nails.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用磁鐵撿起了釘子。

examples.sentence: The fridge has a [magnet] to keep the door closed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 冰箱上有一個磁鐵來保持門關閉。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To tie or fasten something tightly.

examples.sentence: They had to [bind] the package securely.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們必須把包裹牢牢捆好。

examples.sentence: The artist used string to [bind] the sculpture together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 藝術家用線把雕塑捆起來。

examples.sentence: He tried to [bind] his wounds after the accident.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 事故後，他試圖包紮他的傷口。
